definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: When she woke up, she told me my fats made the best pillow ever.
sentences.chinese: 她睡醒以後說，我的肚腩當枕頭真是絕了。
